item.description:
Learn the latest about how to meet women, how to communicate and how to deal with gender differences. Much of the research comes from teaching many workshops on the topic but also from interviewing many women. Learn how to maintain your maleness and self connection with women.

Herb is a relationship coach and personality types expert. He is led thousands of workshops over the last 30 years and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, the 9 types personality system he as been teaching for 20 years.

herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com

7-9:30pm

$40, sliding scale to $20
item.name: Men's Group - On Relating to Women
